changeSet.author: elena
changeSet.comment: Create Animal table and test data
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE `Animal` ( `id` INTEGER NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nickname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `sex` CHAR NOT NULL, `type` BIGINT NOT NULL , `chip` VARCHAR(50) NULL , `weight` INTEGER NULL , `birthday` DATE NULL , `breed` INTEGER NULL , `color` VARCHAR(50) NULL , `place_of_birth` VARCHAR(50) NULL , `human` INTEGER NULL , `TNVED_code` VARCHAR(20) NULL , `color_ENG` VARCHAR(50) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
INSERT INTO `Animal` (`nickname`,`sex`, `type`,`chip`,`breed`,`color`,`color_ENG`) VALUES ('Собакен','m','1','643093300085088','1','черный','black'); INSERT INTO `Animal` (`nickname`,`sex`, `type`,`chip`,`breed`,`color`,`color_ENG`) VALUES ('Кошак','w','1','6430934223488','1','белый','white');
